# function: list_subset

Returns true when every element of the input collection exists in the allowed collection.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  allowed_roles = ["reader", "writer", "admin"]
  team_roles    = ["writer", "reader"]
}

output "list_subset_example" {
  value = {
    roles_valid = provider::validatefx::list_subset(local.team_roles, local.allowed_roles)
  }
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
list_subset(values list of string, allowed list of string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `values` (List of String, Nullable) 
1. `allowed` (List of String)
